example.eg: One cannot buy a single shoe, one must buy a pair.
example.egtrans: 你不能买一只鞋子，你必须买一双鞋。

example.eg: The lovers are an inseparable pair.
example.egtrans: 这对恋人如胶似漆得像连体婴。

example.eg: The queen's carriage was pulled by six pairs of horses.

dsense.name: pair
dsense.guideword: (two playing cards of same number) (指纸牌)

example.eg: I have a pair of kings and three queens.

dsense.name: pair
dsense.guideword: (two-part object) (由两个同样部分构成的东西，如剪刀)

example.eg: The two blades together formed a pair of scissors.
Pair the students for the dance so that each boy is with a girl.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将...凑成一对, 使成双

example.eg: My socks are all in a jumble; I must pair them with their partners.
We pair our cows with the bull from the next farm.
The teacher made all the kids groan when he paired the boys off with the girls and made them learn how to dance.
Okay everyone, pair off and begin the exercise please.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 牵线, 牵线搭桥, 配对
结对, 成对, 两人一组

dsense.name: au pair
dsense.guideword: (live-in childminder) (指国外来的以料理家务、照看小孩等换取膳宿的人)

example.eg: They had an au pair to take care of the children.
example.egtrans: 他们有一位互惠工人来照顾小孩。

example.eg: Grandfather keeps an antique pair of bellows next to the fireplace.
example.egtrans: 爷爷在壁炉旁边放着一对老式的风箱。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 风箱, 手拉式鼓风机

example.eg: The architect used a compass to draw a perfect circle.
example.egtrans: 建筑师使用圆规画出了一个完美的圆圈。

example.eg: The geometry students used compasses to draw perfect circles.
If you go bird-watching, it's always a good idea to carry a pair of binoculars.
My son has already outgrown the last pair of pants I bought him.  She bought three pairs of pants at the mall in one day!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一条裤子, 一条长裤

example.eg: Be sure to include a good sharp pair of scissors in your sewing kit.
He needs a new pair of trousers for the job interview.
